title.narrative: Accountable, Responsive and Capable Government (ARC) - Long Term + Short Term Consultancies

description.narrative: This activity ( Accountable, Responsive and Capable Government (ARC) - Long Term + Short Term Consultancies) is a component of Partnership to Engage, Reform and Learn (PERL) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £49,909,829. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Domestic revenue mobilisation, Education policy and administrative management, Health policy and administrative management, Public finance management (PFM). , with the following implementing partners: DAI Europe. The start date is 02-05-2016 and the end date is 30-04-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Accountability - General Public Service - Accountability - debt and aid management
Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
Health - Social Affairs - Health - policy, planning and administration
